DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine day onset efficacy tadalafil dose once-a-day .
DOC.criteria: Male least 18 year old , least 3month history erectile dysfunction ( ED ) . Anticipate adult female sexual partner study . Agree make least 4 sexual intercourse attempt female partner 4week runin phase without medication . Agree make least 1 sexual intercourse attempt per day female partner day 14 follow randomization ( minimum three attempt required period ) . Also agree make least 3 intercourse attempt day 514 follow randomization . Agree use ED treatment study 24 hour final study visit . Partner Female least 18 year old . Agree make least 4 sexual intercourse attempt male sexual study partner 4week runin phase without medication . Agree make least 1 sexual intercourse attempt per day male partner day 14 follow randomization Agree make least 3 intercourse attempt day 514 follow randomization . Previous current treatment tadalafil phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor daily basis daily use . ED cause primary sexual disorder , untreated inadequately treat endocrine disease . History radical prostatectomy , pelvic surgery penile implant . Clinically significant penile deformity opinion investigator . Clinically significant renal insufficiency , hepatobiliary disease determine investigator . Glycosylated hemoglobin > 11 % . Present chronic stable angina treat longacting nitrate , chronic stable angina require shortacting nitrate last 90 day , angina occur sexual intercourse last 6 month . Have significant cardiac condition describe protocol exclusion criterion . Have history significant central nervous system injury within last 6 month . Have history Human Immunodeficiency Virus infection . Have condition would interfere subject 's ability provide inform consent comply study instruction , would place subject increase risk , might confound interpretation study result . Currently receive treatment nitrate , cancer chemotherapy , antiandrogens ( except finasteride take Propecia Proscar , Avodart [ dutasteride ] ) . History drug , alcohol , substance abuse within past 6 month , assess investigator . Previously complete withdrawn study investigate tadalafil daily use . Received treatment within last 30 day drug receive regulatory approval indication time study entry . Prior ineffective treatment PDE5 inhibitor opinion investigator .
